name: required-labels
description: Automated label checking for github pull requests

REQUIRED_LABELS_ANY.description: At least one of these labels must be present on the PR

REQUIRED_LABELS_ALL.description: All of these labels must be present on the PR

REQUIRED_LABELS_BANNED.description: None of these labels should be present on the PR

GITHUB_USER.description: The username for the github user that will post the status

GITHUB_PW.description: The password for the github user that will post the status
